org.pepstock.charba.client.options.elements

Class Arc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.JavaScriptObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.ChartContainer
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.elements.Arc

  • public final class Arc
extends ChartContainer
    Arcs are used in the polar area, doughnut and pie charts.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
    PolarAreaChart, DoughnutChart, PieChart
